title: Almost 100,000 children could be in care by 2025
content: The figure for England would represent a 36% rise in a decade, research for county councils says.

title: MPs to debate social care cost cap plan
content: New details emerged last week that charities have warned could hit poorer people the hardest.

title: Labour: Patel incompetent over Channel crossings
content: But former Home Secretary Sajid Javid says he is confident his successor is doing everything she can.

title: EU accuses Brexit minister of 'political posturing'
content: The European Commission VP, Maroš Šefčovič, says the UK should not "bring more problems to the table".

title: Javid orders review of medical device racial bias
content: The health secretary responds to research suggesting oximeters work less well for darker-skinned people.

title: Mental health deaths on the rise, figures suggest
content: An ex-health secretary warns staff shortages are now compromising patient safety in the NHS.

title: Ross calls for evidence over vaccine passports
content: The Scottish Conservative leader says the Scottish government have not proved the tool prevents Covid spread.
